mapper.select: SELECT ASSETCODE, ASSETNAME, ACQUISITIONDATE, ACCOUNTNAME, CLIENTNAME, SANGGAKWAY, ACQUISITIONPRICE, SLIPNUMBER, RESIDUALVALUE, UNIT, JUKYO, UNITPRICE, QUANTITY, COMPANYCODE FROM ASSET
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSET (ASSETCODE, ASSETNAME, ACQUISITIONDATE, ACCOUNTNAME, CLIENTNAME, SANGGAKWAY, ACQUISITIONPRICE, SLIPNUMBER, RESIDUALVALUE, UNIT, JUKYO, UNITPRICE, QUANTITY, COMPANYCODE) VALUES (#{assetCode},#{assetName},#{acquistionDate},#{accountName},#{clientName},#{sanggakWay},#{acquistionPrice},#{slipNumber},#{residualvalue},#{unit},#{juckyo},#{unitPrice},#{quantity},#{companyCode})
